mapper.select: select distinct --f.xf_status, (case f.xf_status when '24' then '法务部审批-张兴凤' when '26' then '财务部审批-张冬梅' when '2P' then '财务部审核保证金-刘英' when '2S' then '租务经理审批-肖莉莉' end) as processPoint, staff.name as creator, a.leasenumber as leaseNumber, isnull(a.bpmsn,'') as bpmsn, b.value as proValue, d.value as rentValue, e.value as rentType, isnull(convert(varchar(10),a.accepttime,120),'') as accepttime from ERP.dbo.lease as a left join ERP.dbo.sysparameter as b on a.rowstatusguid=b.guid left join ERP.dbo.sysparameter as d on a.rentstatusguid=d.guid left join ERP.dbo.sysparameter as e on a.leasetypeguid=e.guid left join ERP.dbo.customer as r on a.customerguid=r.guid left join HR.dbo.Staff as staff on a.createby=staff.id left join OPENQUERY(KECHUAN_PROD,'select xf_contractno leasenumber,xf_status from smsc_a.VIEW_CONTRACTMASTER') as f on a.leasenumber=f.leasenumber where isnull(b.value,'nnn')<>'草稿' and a.isdeleted=0 and f.XF_STATUS in ('24','26','2P','2S') and a.accepttime is not null
